text: Pont-Farcy is a former commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Manche department in the northwest of France. Before 1 January 2018, it was part of the Calvados department.Décret n° 2017-1756 26 December 2017 On 1 January 2018, it was merged into the commune of Tessy-Bocage.Arrêté préfectoral 28 December 2017 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Pont-Farcy
